title: Maruti Suzuki ordered to refund car's price as airbag did not deploy during accident
description: ​​ The consumer approached the redressal body alleging it was the fault of the manufacturer that the airbag did not deploy, which caused him serious injuries. The Motor Vehicle Inspector also reported that the airbag did not function at the time of the crash.
